meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the unhurried walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: The unhurried cat strolled lazily along the fence.
meanings.sent3: The unhurried turtle won the race by taking its time.
meanings.sent4: His unhurried manner in solving problems impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unhurried flow of the river soothed her troubled mind.

meanings.definition: Done or taking place at a leisurely pace.
meanings.sent1: The unhurried painting captured the artist's calm mood.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed an unhurried breakfast on the sunny porch.
meanings.sent3: The unhurried snail set a new record for slowness.
meanings.sent4: Her unhurried speech pattern made her a captivating storyteller.
meanings.sent5: The unhurried growth of the tree symbolized patience and resilience.
